resources.string: Big entertainment venue featuring a bowling alley, an arcade & a sports bar.\n\nAddress: 14950 SW Barrows Rd, Beaverton, OR 97007
Experience the thrill of skydiving without having to jump from a perfectly good airplane.\n\nAddress: 10645 SW Greenburg Rd, Portland, OR 97223
Glowing Greens Mini Golf Blacklight Adventures Oregon
Family fun with indoor blacklight mini golf and other fun things to do.\n\nAddress: 3855 SW Murray Blvd #2317, Beaverton, OR 97005
Old-school bowling alley with a pro shop, a restaurant, batting cages & a large arcade.\n\nAddress: 6360 SE Alexander St, Hillsboro, OR 97123
Dedicated August 29, 2004, serves as a permanent reminder of the Holocaust.\n\nLocation: Washington Park, Portland, OR 97207
A historical home with wonderful views of downtown Portland.\n\nLocation: 3229 NW Pittock Dr, Portland, OR 97210
Local landmark since 1974.\n\nLocation: 21250 SW Tualatin Valley Hwy, Aloha, OR 97003
This popular park offers miles of trails, and an extensive rose garden.\n\nLocation: 1715 South West Skyline Boulevard, Portland, OR 97221
Community-supported since 1888, the Oregon Zoo is a world leader in animal welfare and conservation.\n\nLocation: 4001 SW Canyon Rd, Portland, OR 97221
The largest urban park in the county, lined with trails for hiking and biking.\n\nLocation: NW 29 & Upshur to Newberry Road, Portland, OR 97210
Paved path along Fanno Creek for hiking or biking.\n\nLocation: SW Denney Rd, Beaverton, OR
Theater complex with multiple screens, all-stadium seating & self-service ticketing kiosks.\n\nAddress: 3200 SW Hocken Ave, Beaverton, OR 97005
Retro discount, movie theater serving casual fare, beer & wine; 21+ only after 8 PM.\n\nAddress: 9360 SW Beaverton Hillsdale Hwy, Beaverton, OR 97005
Moviegoers can take food from the on-site eatery to their seats, with table service in 21+ theaters.\n\nAddress: 12345 SW Horizon Blvd #231, Beaverton, OR 97007
